conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Hi, my name is Alex and I'm reaching out from DeepData AI. We're a data processing solution that helps companies like yours streamline their data workflow and gain valuable insights. I saw that your company uses CorelDRAW Graphics Suite, and I think our solution could complement your design workflow by automating data-related tasks.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: Ah, yes. We do use CorelDRAW. But I'm not sure how a data processing solution would fit into our workflow. We're a design-focused company, and most of our data is related to customer information and sales. What makes you think your solution would be a good fit for us?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: That's a great point. Our solution can actually help you analyze customer data and sales trends, which could inform your design decisions and help you create more targeted marketing materials. For example, we've worked with other design companies to help them automate report generation and data visualization, freeing up more time for creative work.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I see what you mean. But we're currently in the middle of a big project, and I'm not sure we have the bandwidth to implement a new solution right now. Plus, I'd need to run this by our CFO, and I'm not sure she'd be on board with the cost. What's the pricing for DeepData AI?

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: Our pricing starts at $5,000 per year, with discounts available for larger teams or longer-term commitments. We also offer a free trial, so you can test out the solution and see the value for yourself before making a commitment.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: $5,000 per year is a bit steep for us, to be honest. We're a smaller company, and our budget is tight. I'd need to see some serious ROI before I could justify that kind of expense. And what about integration with our existing systems? We use a custom CRM, and I'd need to make sure your solution would play nice with that.

conversation.speaker: Seller
conversation.message: I understand your concerns. We do have an API that allows for custom integrations, so we could work with your team to integrate with your CRM. And I'd be happy to provide some case studies and ROI analysis to help make the business case for our solution.

conversation.speaker: Buyer
conversation.message: I appreciate the offer, but I think we're going to have to pass on DeepData AI for now. The price is just too high, and I'm not convinced that the benefits would outweigh the costs. Maybe if you had a more tiered pricing structure or a more basic version of the solution, we might be interested, but for now, I'm going to have to say no.

analysis.raw:
Score: 4
Outcome: Failure
Key_Objection: Price
Feedback: The seller should consider offering more flexible pricing options or a basic version of the solution to cater to smaller companies with tighter budgets. Sentiment: Neutral
